categories.name: Mindfulness & Grounding
activities: Practice a 5-minute guided meditation using a free app or video.
Perform a '5-4-3-2-1' grounding exercise: Name 5 things you see, 4 you can touch, 3 you can hear, 2 you can smell, and 1 you can taste.
Eat one meal or snack mindfully, paying full attention to the taste, texture, and smell, without distractions.

categories.name: Physical Activity
activities: Go for a 15-minute brisk walk outside.
Do a 10-minute stretching routine, focusing on areas of tension.
Put on your favorite upbeat song and dance for its entire duration.

categories.name: Cognitive & Creative
activities: Write down three things that went well today, however small.
Spend 15 minutes on a creative hobby: drawing, writing, playing an instrument, etc.
Challenge a recurring negative thought: Ask yourself, 'Is this 100% true? What's a more balanced perspective?'

categories.name: Connection & Environment
activities: Send a thoughtful message to a friend or family member you haven't spoken to recently.
Tidy up a single drawer, shelf, or your desktop for 10 minutes.
Spend 10 minutes in a natural setting, like a park or garden, if possible.
